• Rehabilitation and Human Services Intern Database
Internship Database

Welcome to the Internship Database which is available to all RHS students looking for contact information to secure an internship. When conducting your search, you can find available sites by geographic location (state/county), client populations and disability types (e.g., intellectual disabilities) and/or client grouping (e.g., female/male, adolescents). Our updated data base allows you to conduct a search by cross-listing any combination you wish. So, for example, you could find sites located in Centre County that provide services to adolescents with intellectual disabilities. While most students are likely to select sites in Pennsylvania, as you will see on the next link, we have sites located throughout the United States. Â
